alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 2:48AM PST until March 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Accumulating small hail. Snow accumulations up to 2 inches possible this morning in northern parts of the coastal plain and at elevations over 500 feet. Snow levels will rise through the morning ending likely ending the snow potential. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Small hail can make roads icy very quickly.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
